title: REVEALER: Reinforcement-Guided Visual Reasoning for Element-Level Text-Image Alignment Evaluation
summary: Evaluating the alignment between textual prompts and generated images is critical for ensuring the reliability and usability of text-to-image (T2I) models. However, most existing evaluation methods rely on coarse-grained metrics or static QA pipelines, which lack fine-grained interpretability and struggle to reflect human preferences.
